articles.title: Health benefits of 'true tea' support including drink in dietary guidelines, researchers argue - FoodNavigator-USA.com
articles.description: Daily tea consumption should be recommended in the upcoming 2025-2030 Dietary Guidelines for Americans, argue scientists and industry stakeholders who point to its safety and a growing body of research supporting health benefits from the Camellia sinensis pla…
articles.content: Over the last 10 years, or even 15 years, the evidence has been building to the point where I think we have what I would suggest are very clear data that support tea consumption, beyond the current r… [+1495 chars]
